questionTitle: I have had this hat ___ quite a few years.
I haven't played baseball ___ I was a junior high school student.
She's been studying English ___ over six years.
Roy has been playing the violin ___ he was ten years old.
Ken has been studying karate ___ five years.
I haven't slept well ___ last Monday.
He has played tennis ___ a long time.
They have been cleaning their house ___ several hours.
It has been raining ___ yesterday afternoon.
Fred has been in the supermarket ___ less than an hour.
